Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds significant value to me. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests. I kindly propose a purchase price of $10,000. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to share this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
